00020 CliBase::CliBase() : basic("Basic options") {
00021     basic.add_options()
00022                         ("help,h", "Print this help text and exit.")
00023                         ("quite,q", "Quiet operation.")
00024                         ("verbose,v", "Be more verbose.")
00025                         ("service,s", value<string>(), "Use the transfer service at the specified URL.")
00026                         ("source", value<string>(), "Specify source site name.")
00027                         ("destination", value<string>(), "Specify destination site name.")
00028                         ("version,V", "Print the version number and exit.")
00029                         ;
00030 
00031     cli_options.add(basic);
00032 
00033         p.add("source", 1);
00034         p.add("destination", 1);
00035 }
00036 
00037 CliBase::~CliBase() {
00038 
00039 }

00042 void CliBase::initCli(int ac, char* av[]) {
00043         // turn off guessing, so --source is not mistaken with --source-token
00044         int style = command_line_style::default_style & ~command_line_style::allow_guessing;
00045 
00046         store(command_line_parser(ac, av).options(cli_options).positional(p).style(style).run(), vm);
00047         notify(vm);
00048 
00049         if (vm.count("service")) {
00050                 endpoint = vm["service"].as<string>();
00051                 // check if the endpoint has the right prefix
00052                 if (endpoint.find("http") != 0 && endpoint.find("https") != 0 && endpoint.find("httpd") != 0) {
00053                         // if not erase
00054                         cout << "Wrongly formatted endpoint: " << endpoint << endl;
00055                         endpoint.erase();
00056                 }
00057         } else {
00058                 endpoint = discoverService();
00059         }
00060 }
00061 
00062 bool CliBase::printHelp() {
00063 
00064         if (vm.count("help")) {
00065         cout << cli_options << endl;
00066         return true;
00067     }
00068 
00069     return false;
00070 }

00082 bool CliBase::isVerbose() {
00083         return vm.count("verbose");

00086 bool CliBase::isQuite() {
00087         return vm.count("quite");

00090 string CliBase::getService() {
00091 
00092         return endpoint;
00093 }
00094 
00095 string CliBase::getSource() {
00096 
00097         if (vm.count("source")) {
00098                 return vm["source"].as<string>();
00099         }
00100         return "";
00101 }
00102 
00103 string CliBase::getDestination() {
00104 
00105         if (vm.count("destination")) {
00106                 return vm["destination"].as<string>();
00107         }
00108         return "";
00109 }
00110 
00111 string CliBase::discoverService() {
00112 
00113         CliManager* manager = CliManager::getInstance();
00114 
00115         string source = getSource(), destination = getDestination();
00116         SDService *service;
00117         scoped_array<char> c_str_arr, error_arr;
00118         char *error, *c_str = 0;
00119         const char * fts_srvtype;
00120         const char * fts_version;
00121         SDException exc;
00122 
00123         if (source.size() > 0 && destination.size() > 0) {
00124 
00125                 SDServiceData datas[] =
00126                 {
00127                         {"source", (char*) source.c_str()},
00128                         {"destination", (char*) destination.c_str()}
00129                 };
00130 
00131                 SDServiceDataList datalist = {NULL, 2, datas};
00132 
00133                 c_str = glite_discover_service_by_data(manager->FTS3_CA_SD_TYPE.c_str(), &datalist, &error);
00134                 c_str_arr.reset(c_str);
00135                 error_arr.reset(error);
00136         }
00137 
00138         if (getenv(manager->FTS3_SD_ENV.c_str()))
00139                 fts_srvtype = getenv(manager->FTS3_SD_ENV.c_str());
00140         else
00141                 fts_srvtype = manager->FTS3_SD_TYPE.c_str();
00142 
00143         if(getenv(manager->FTS3_IFC_VERSION.c_str()))
00144                 fts_version = getenv(manager->FTS3_IFC_VERSION.c_str());
00145         else
00146                 fts_version = manager->FTS3_INTERFACE_VERSION.c_str();
00147 
00148         // Note: glite_discover_service will check if the service name passed
00149         // has an associated service of the given type (fts_srvtype), if not
00150         // it will check if the name refers to a site name or an host name
00151 
00152         c_str = glite_discover_service_by_version(fts_srvtype, c_str, fts_version, &error);
00153         c_str_arr.reset(c_str);
00154         error_arr.reset(error);
00155 
00156         if (!c_str) {
00157         cout << "Service discovery: " << error << endl;
00158                 return "";
00159         }
00160 
00161         service = SD_getService(c_str, &exc);
00162         if (!service) {
00163                 cout << "Service discovery lookup failed for " << c_str << ": " << exc.reason << endl;
00164                 SD_freeException(&exc);
00165                 return "";
00166         }
00167 
00168         string tmp;
00169         if (service->endpoint) {
00170                 tmp = service->endpoint;
00171         }
00172         SD_freeService(service);
00173 
00174         return tmp;
00175 }
